rtogs la/ /lha rgyal brgya byin bdag yin khyed nyid gang 'dod dang / /sring mo bdag gis nges par gang bya myur du smros/ /de nas gzhon nu de rnams yul gyi bde la 'dod med cing / /rang bzhin g.yo med sems kyis brgya byin zur mig gis bltas nas/ /rang gi dge ba yongs

smin brtan pa'i rang bzhin gyis/ /kha na ma tho med gsal sna tshogs don ldan tshig 'di smras/ /brgya byin bdag cag skye ba'i sdug bsngal gyis ni gdungs gyur pa'i/ /srid pa'i bde ba'i zil pa'i kha chu 'dzag pa'i rgyu 'dra'i phyir/ /bzhin ras mdzes pa mya ngan mchi mas bris shing

rnyogs pa yi/ /gnyen rnams spangs nas dka' thub 'di la rjes su zhugs pa min/ /gzhan yang 'gro ba ma lus tshul ngan gyis bcings mi bzad pa/ /phongs pa brgya phrag stong gis bcom pas nges par skyo gyur cing / /bkren pas nyam thag mthong bas nyes zad rnams kyis rjes

'brangs te/ /rga med mya ngan med pa'i go 'phang thob phyir brtson pa yin/ /gal te 'gro la rjes brtse lhag bsam ngang tshul ldan gyur cing / /ci ste brgya byin khyod kyis mchog ni yang dag ster nus na/ /'chi med mi phrogs tshangs bzhi tshangs pa'i go 'phang rnam grol te/ /srid pa'i

'jigs pas yongs gdungs bdag cag rnams kyis thob par mdzod/ /lus las byung zhing 'dzag pa'i dri ma skyon gyis bsgos par gnas pa dang / /ma yi mngal du mi gtsang 'dam gyi tshogs na yang ma spangs spyod/ /byung na rus pa'i 'khrul 'khor gyis ni ma go btsir brgyal

zhing nyam thag pas/ /nyon mongs sdug bsngal gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i skye ba gcad par mdzod/ /rga ba'i srin mos skra dkar mche ba dkar po myu gu ldan pa yi/ /kha gdangs nas ni 'gro la gzhung lugs med par spyi nas 'dzin byed cing / /gang 'di mi yi

brtson dran blo gros dga' ba'i dpal ni rab 'joms pa/ /lha yi dbang po khyod kyis gal te nus na de las bskyab par mdzod/ /dbugs rgod g.yo zhing lto ba sra la pags pa skya zhing rtsub pa dang / /longs spyod 'bar ba sna tshogs thob kyang spyod par mi nus stobs med pa/ /gang gis

lus zin 'chi bdag pho nya'i skyes bu nad tshogs rab 'jigs pa/ /lha dbang khyod ni ci ste mchog sbyin 'dod na de las bdag cag skyobs/ /mig ni phyir phyogs gyur cing mi g.yo gnad rnams gcod pas sdug bsngal ba/ /nyon mongs 'khrugs pas rab tu lus bcom 'jigs

pas phung po 'gyel ba dang / /gnyen rnams mthong bas mchi mas mkhur ba dag dang mchu ni bkrus gyur pa/ /gang gis zin na rab tu 'jigs 'gyur 'chi ba de las bdag cag srungs/ /gang gis yid khyab gyur na phyugs bzhin 'gyur zhing mya ngan gyis zin la/ /bya dang mi bya'i rnam

pa blo la mi sems smad pa'i gnas bskyed pa/ /tha mal bsil ba'i 'thor ba'i rlung gis g.yab kyang lus tshim mi 'gyur ba'i/ /'dod chags me chen de ni mchog sbyin khyod kyis nges par zhi bar mdzod/ /gang gi shugs kyis mig 'gyur g.yo zhing so yis sgros gnon la/ /skad

cig gis kyang mi bzad dmyal ba'i 'bras bu ster byed sdig can ni/ /dengs pa'i lo ma dang ni chu dag za ba'i thub rnams kyis kyang ma bton pa'i/ /yid kyi sul gnas khro ba'i sbrul de brgya byin khyod kyis bsal bar mdzod/ /gang gis mig khebs gyur na blo gros ngan rnams zhi ba'i lam

spong zhing / /log lta'i dug gis nye bar sbags pa'i yid kyis lam gzhan dag la bsten/ /gang zhig rab rib bsal bas zag pa kun gyi rgyur ni rab gsungs pa/ /log yid khyim na spyod pa rmongs pa'i mun nag brgya byin khyod kyis sol/ /brgya byin mchog ni de dag rnams/ /

khyod la bdag cag rnams slong gis/ /dam bcas don las 'gal ba ni/ /mkhas pas 'dod par mi byed do/ /de nas brgya byin gyis de rnams 'dod pa'i yul dag slong bar mi byed cing ltos pa med la gsal zhing mdzes pa'i tshig gis rnam par 'khrul pas ngo mtshar

du gyur cing yang dag par dad pas lus kyi spu zing zhes byed de/ smras pa/ mi 'byor dngos po slong bar gyur pa ni/ /'jig rten dag na bra zhing zhum gyur pas/ /gang 'di bdag gis sbyin bar nus pa yi/ /mchog rnams sbyin gyi bu mo khyed kyis smros/ /de nas bu mo de

rnams kyis de'i nang na mi mngon ba'i rgyus rnam par smras pa'i tshig des yang dag par skyo bas nye bar bskyed pa'i khro bas brgya byin la smras pa/ ci phyir nye bar 'drid pa'i thabs dang ni/ /brgya byin mdzem med de dag gang du lhags/ /bde ba tsam dang mi mkhas blo can nam/ /mi

bsrun pa yi bgrod bya bdag cag min/ /'dir ni phyogs rnams rgya cher grags pa'i tshogs ldan pa'i/ /rgyal po'i rigs su gyur par khyod kyis mi shes sam/ /gang gis nor gyi snying po nges par bltas nas ni/ /nor bdag ming yang ji bzhin don dang ldan pa yi/ /rga bas

gzir zhing 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal gyis/ /dub cing yid 'byung zhum pa'i 'jigs spang phyir/ /lha yi mgon po gnas skabs 'dir zhugs kyi/ /dregs pas ma yin byis min mi brtan min/ /bsod nams byed pa rnams la 'tshe ba'i phyir/ /gang phyir khyed ko bdag cag

sdug bsngal byed/ /gnyen dang mdza' bshes 'khor gyi sbyor ba yi/ /dga' bas brgya byin yun ring 'tsho bar gyis/ /rang byas mgo skal ldan pa'i 'bar ba yi/ /gang phyir lha yi bdag por khyod gyur des/ /gzhan gtses rgyu yis lha yi rgyal po yi/ /dam pa'i phun sum

tshogs thob mi 'gyur ro/ /de nas dbang po chen po des de'i tshig gsal zhing tshig gi don sna tshogs ston pa'i tshig rnams kyis lus tshim zhing / mchog tu ngo mtshar du gyur la dad pas bzhin rab tu dang zhing mdzes pa dang / gzhan yang de rnams kyis bsam pa

sad pa'i phyir shin tu bsti stang dang bcas pa'i tshig gis smras pa/ kye ma ma dang 'dra ba'i sring mo dag /'jig rten dka' thub can dag kyang / /mgon du bdag ni lta 'dod na/ /ci phyir 'di ltar mchog ster ba/ /nga la khyed rnams

brtse med 'gyur/ /de nas bu mo de rnams lhag par yang 'khrugs shing khro ba dang bcas pas brgya byin la smras pa/ bde sogs kyis ni bzhin ras la/ /chags shing 'dzum dang zur mig gis/ /rnam lta'i gnas ni gzhan yin zhing / /sbyin bya'i

mchog kyang gzhan yin no/ /gal te brgya byin khyod kyis ni/ /mchog rab ster bar nus na ni/ /yul rnams kyi ni sha za ni/ /mi srun de las rgyal bar gyis/ /yang na 'dod pa spang dka' zhing / /log pa'i rtog pas chags gyur na/ /rgyun de nyid la rtag tu

gnos/ /gal te nus yod 'di 'drar gyis/ /mig stong ldan khyod mi brtan pa'i/ /'dod la yid ni chags gyur pa/ /khyod ni sbyin bya tha dad na/ /mchog ces pa ni ji ltar smra/ /ji ltar chu bo 'jigs pa yi/ /shugs kyis bdas par gyur pa'i mi/ /gzhan

dag bsgral bar bya'o zhes/ /yongs rtogs byed pa'i rmongs pa'i gnas/ /skra rnams bregs par gyur nas ni/ /phyag dar khrod kyi gos 'chang zhing / /dgon pa yul du 'dod par ni/ /nam zhig de ltar 'gyur zhig gu/ /gnya' shing gang tsam rnam lta zhing / /sa yi

lhung bzed lag thogs nas/ /dpyas med khyim nas khyim du ni/ /nam zhig slong mo spyod par 'gyur/ /rnyed dang bkur sti chags med cing / /nyon mongs tsher ma'i 'dam rdzab dag /sbyor ba byed cing grong khyer gyi/ /sbyin pa'i gnas su nam zhig 'gyur/ /rtswa yi tshogs

las langs nas ni/ /ba mos lci ba'i gos dag dang / /zas skom ngan ngon tsam gang gis/ /nam zhig lus la chags med 'gyur/ /shing drung ne tso ltar ljang ba'i/ /ngur pa 'jam po'i gos can du/ /mthong chos bde ba'i dga' ston dang / /nam zhig

bdag ni nyal bar 'gyur/ /'dor bar 'gyur ba'i lus srog la/ /chu dang rtswa yi zil pa ltar/ /ltos med yun ring goms pa yi/ /bde ba chen po nam zhig 'thob/ /nam zhig chu ngogs sman ljongs su/ /gnas nas chu ngogs 'byung 'jig dang / /'tsho ba'i

'jig rten gnas 'dra bar/ /yang dang yang du lta bar 'gyur/ /lta ba kun gyi mar gyur pa'i/ /'jig tshogs lta ba 'byin pa dang / /srid pa'i longs spyod mi 'dod par/ /bdag ni nam zhig 'gyur zhig gu/ /rmi lam smig rgyu sgyu ma sprin/ /dri za'i grong khyer mtshungs

par ni/ /rgyu dang mi rgyu'i 'jig rten dag /nam zhig rtogs par byed par 'gyur/ /ming po 'di ltar dga' ba yi/ /re ba'i yid kyis rnam rol pas/ /zang zing bcas shing g.yo ba yi/ /mchog de rnams kyis ci zhig bgyi/ /kye ma mchog rab sbyin par sems gzhan

yang / /log par rtog pa skad cig tsam 'ga' zhig /lha mgon 'dod pa ngo bo nyid kyis g.yo/ /g.yang sa chen po mun nag bcas 'dra bas/ /sems rgya che ba'i dam pas rnam par spangs/ /mi rigs 'tshe ba kun gyi rgyur gyur cing / /'dod pas mi rnams 'khrul

par byed pas na/ /'di ni smad bya 'jigs pa chen po ste/ /mi gtsang bsgos pa'i sbrul nag dag dang mtshungs/ /gang 'di thog mtha' med nas 'gro ba dang / /'gro bar 'gyur dang gnas pa'i sems can lus/ /de ni gsod 'joms bstan dang mtshungs pas na/ /

sdig pa'i gzhir gyur 'dod pas ci zhig bya/ /lha dbang brgya byin 'dod pa'i yul 'di ni/ /phyag dar khrod 'drar byed 'dra'i ngo bo bas/ /brdzun par rtog cing rnam smin mi bzad pa'i/ /'dod pa yid kyis kyang ni su zhig bstan/ /bai DUR+Ya sngo ljang skyes pa yi rtswa

dang ni/ /me tog rgyas par gyur pa'i shing gi nags spangs nas/ /lcags kyu rnon pos spyi bor 'tshog cing 'dri ba dang / /glang chen dbang pos khur skyed yul gyis bslus pa yin/ /mdung rtse lus bskyon grong gi kha yi tshogs rnams kyi/ /gshog pa'i

rlung gis rab tu g.yob par byed 'gyur la/ /mdza' bo rnams kyang g.yo byas mig gis lta byed par/ /skyes bu 'jigs par 'gyur ba'ang yul gyis brlag pa yin/ /byis pa log rtog rlung gis rab 'bar 'dod pa yis/ /rang

nyid khang pa bdag nyid kyis ni sreg byed na/ /smyig ma lo brgya lon pa phan tshun 'dar ba yis/ /rang nyid kyis ni sreg par byed pa ji bzhin no/ /brgya byin gzhan yang rnam rgyal khang par gnas nas ni/ /'od 'phro nor bu'i dpal gyis dga' ba 'di las

ni/ /me chen rang 'bar 'jigs pa'i mnar med sar phyin pas/ /gang 'di dug can yul gyi bde ba de ni bde legs min/ /mtho ris gnas nas 'gro ba ngan pa'i gnas 'jug cing / /skad cig gis lhung 'pho ba'i sdug bsngal gyis gzir pa/ /

gang dag myong 'gyur lha yi 'jig rten mngon dga' ba/ /sngar myong gyur pa de ni bde ba myong ma yin/ /gser gyi pad+ma kha khyer ngang pa nyal ba dang / /gang 'dir lha yi khang pa rdzing bur grul rgal ba dag /'dod pa'i las kyis slar yang mi ro rul pa yis/ /

gzings pa'i chu bo rab med nang du ltung bar 'gyur/ /yongs su gyur na dga' bral rmi lam lta bu yi/ /lha rnams bde la de ni brgya byin su zhig 'dod/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten khros pa'i sbrul gyis me ltar g.yo bar ni/ /thams cad rtog pas bdag

cag thar la gzhol ba gnas/ /srid 'gro tshang tshing nang na gnas pa'i byis pa rnams/ /'di bde yin zhes pa de log par brtags tsam ste/ /gang 'di srid pa ma lus sdug bsngal kun bskyed ces/ /yang dag gsungs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams

kyis gsungs/ /'tsho ba'i 'jig rten rang bzhin sdug bsngal mang pos g.yengs 'gyur te/ /gang tshe 'di na bde ba myong ba'ang bya rog ta lar mtshungs/ /de yang phrad gyur sdug bsngal du mas zil gyis gnon 'gyur te/ /chu bo'i chu ni rgya mtshor

phyin pa dag dang mtshungs/ /gang phyir bud med lag pa ge sar bcas pa'i pad+ma'i 'dab 'dra dang / /gdu bu cung zad khrol ba tsan dan bsil bas bsgos par gyur pa yis/ /reg cing zangs ltar dmar bcas sor mo zlum pas brtse bas 'khyud par

byas pa dang / /bsil yab rlung gi rgyan phreng gtor bas khyab par gnyid log gyur pa dag /'jag ma'i rtse mor bcer ba'i lam du thal ba dang 'dres rlung dmar ni/ /drag pos g.yob cing dub la lci ba'i lus kyi slar yang nyal 'gyur te/ /de bas 'tsho

ba'i 'jig rten skad cig thang cig g.yo bar shes gyis la/ /phongs pa'i 'bras 'byin 'dod pa spongs la tshams pa'i zhi la brten par gyis/ /de nas bu mo rnams la mig stong ldan/ /dga' bas lus kyi ba spu ldang 'gyur zhing / /brtson la mngon dga'i

sems dang lhan cig gis/ /sum cu rtsa gsum mngon phyogs song bar gyur/ /de nas bu mo de rnams rab byung nyer son cing / /de nyid don la rnam brtag blo mig dgang gyur pas/ /dregs pa'i chu rlabs g.yo zhing 'jigs par byed pa

yi/ /sdug bsngal mtsho chen mtha' med 'khor ba brgal bar gyur/ /'gro ba ma rig mdongs pa kun gyi mig gcig pa/ /rang bzhin 'gro don rnam byed nges pa'i bdag nyid kyi/ /thub pas sems can rnams la tshul 'di gsungs pas na/ /sems

can rnams kyi srid pa'i tsher ma zad par shog /gzhon nu ma bdun gyi rtogs pa brjod pa/slob dpon gsang ba byin gyis mdzad pa rdzogs so// //[ ]@/ /bslab pa bcu'i cho ga bzhugs/ /@##/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba

dus 'di nas bzung nas byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar du/ rkang gnyis kyi mchog sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad gzigs pa la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de bzhin du/ 'dod chags dang bral ba rnams kyi mchog chos la skyabs su
mchi'o/ /tshogs rnams kyi mchog dge 'dun la skyabs su mchi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o zhes pa skyabs su 'gro ba'i cho ga'o/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ /bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus

'di nas bzung ste sang nyi ma shar gyi bar du srog gcod pa thams cad dang gzhan gyi nor 'phrog pa thams cad dang / mi tshangs par spyod pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / 'bru'i chang dang / bcos pa'i chang dang / myos par 'gyur ba bag med pa'i gnas

dang / dus ma yin pa'i kha zas dang / khri stan mthon po dang / khri stan chen po dang / glu gar dang / rol mo'i sgra dang / phreng ba dang / spos nyug pa dang / rgyan dang kha dog 'chang pa las slar zlog par bgyi'o/ /'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams kyi

bslab pa la rjes su slob po / /rjes su sgrub po / /sems kyi rgyan gyi phyir dang / sems kyi yo byad kyi phyir dang / don gyi mchog sangs rgyas nyid rab tu 'grub pa'i slad du/ bdag gso sbyong la gnas par slob dpon gyis gzung du gsol/ de ltar

lan gnyis lan gsum du'o/ /bsnyen gnas yan lag brgyad pa dang / gso sbyong gi sdom pa'i cho ga'o/ /slob dpon dgongs su gsol/ bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba dus 'di nas bzung nas ji srid byang chub snying po la mchis kyi bar

du/ srog gcod pa spangs te srog gcod pa las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de bzhin du/ ma byin par len pa dang / 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang / brdzun du smra ba dang / phra ma dang / tshig rtsub mo dang / ngag 'khyal ba dang / brnab

sems dang / gnod sems dang / log par lta ba las bzlog par bgyi'o/ /de ltar lan gnyis lan gsum du'o zhes pa bslab pa bcu'i cho ga klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas gsungs pa rtse thang lo tsA ba gzhon nu'i zhabs kyi 'gyur// //

@##/ /rgya gar skad du/ ye d+ha rmASh+TI ka /bod skad du/ ye d+harmA'i 'grel ba/ sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/ /da ni ye d+harmA he tu pra bA wa he tuM/ zhes bya ba la sogs pas rgyud rab tu gnas pa'i don du grub pa'i mtha' gsungs pa yin te/ 'chad pa po

rnams la yang gsungs pa yin no/ /mdo sde dang ni rnal 'byor gyi/ /khang par yang ni 'jug pa nang / /ye d+harmA sogs tshigs bcad kyis/ /sangs rgyas grub mtha'i phyag rgyas btab/ /ces so/ /de yang ye d+harmA sogs ni bod kyi skad du/ chos rnams

gang dag rgyus 'byung de dag ni/ /rgyu dang de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang / /de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te/ /de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /zhes bya ba'o/ /chos rnams gang dag rgyus byung zhes pa la gang dag ni rab tu

grags pa bdun po rnams te/ ma rig pa la sogs pa'i lcags sgrog gis kun du bskor ba'i 'khor lo ni rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bdag nyid can no/ /de dag ni zhes pa nyon mongs pa dang / las dang sdug bsngal gyi yan lag gsum dang / gnyis dang

bdun gyis phye bas gsum du yang gyur pa yin te/ ma rig pa'i thog ma yin par sangs rgyas nyid kyis gsungs pa yin no/ /ma rig pa dang / 'du byed dang / rnam par shes pa dang / ming dang / gzugs dang / skye mched drug dang / reg pa dang /

tshor ba dang / sred pa dang / len pa dang / srid pa dang / skye ba dang / rga shi ste bcu gnyis po rnams so/ /ma rig pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug gi bdag nyid can no/ /'du byed ni sngon gyi las so/ /rnam par shes pa ni mngal

du 'jug pa'o/ /ming dang gzugs ni nur nur po la sogs pa lnga'o/ /skye mched drug ni mig la sogs pa la 'dod do/ /reg pa ni yul dang / dbang po dang / rnam par shes pa rnams phrad pa'o/ /tshor ba ni bde ba la sogs pa'i bdag

nyid can no/ /sred pa ni 'khrig pa'i 'dod chags so/ /len pa ni 'dod pa'i yul len pa'o/ /srid pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i srid pa'i 'bras bu can gyi las so/ /skye ba ni slar yang phung po nying mtshams sbyor ba'o/ /rga shi

ni gsal lo/ /dang po dang / brgyad pa dang / dgu pa rnams ni nyon mongs pa'o/ /las ni gnyis pa dang / bcu pa'o/ /lhag ma bdun ni sdug bsngal lo/ /de gsum gyis bsdus pa'i phyir bcu gnyis ni chos rnams so/ /gsum las gsum dang gnyis

las gnyis 'byung la/ /bdun las bdun yin pa'i phyir/ de kho na 'khor ba'i 'khor lo rgyu dang 'bras bu yang ste/ 'gro ba thams cad de/ 'dir sems can gzhan ni 'ga' yang yod pa ma yin te/ stong pa 'od zer ltar chos rnams las stong pa'i chos

rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/ kha ton dang / mar me lta bu dag ni rgyu las byung ba'i don du'o/ /rgyu dang de rnams kyi yang de bzhin gshegs pa nyid kyis bka' stsal te zhes pa ni/ de ji ltar thugs su chud pa de bzhin du gsungs pa'i phyir te/ gzhan ma

yin par gsung ba nyid kyi phyir 'khor ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gsungs pa yin no/ /de la 'gog pa gang yin pa'ang / /zhes bya ba la/ 'ang gi sgra las de kho na rgyu dang bsams par gsungs pa yin gyi/ sangs rgyas rnams kyi mya ngan las 'das pa yan lag bcu gnyis

'gog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang gsungs pa yin te/ zung 'jug pa'i bde ba brtags pa nam mkha'i me tog ma yin zhing sems med pa bems po ma yin pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de skad gsungs pa'i tshul can dge sbyong che/ /zhes bya ba ni zung du 'jug pa gsung
ba'i tshul can yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas te/ phyin ci ma log par gsung ba'i tshul can gyi tshangs pa'i cho ga'o/ /'di ni slob dpon rtag pa'i rdo rjes gsungs pa gzhon nus bsgyur ba'o// //
